TextView.android:text: The player has to select one of the 4 buttons that are placed At the bottom of the screen (below the two photos that the player compares between) that he thinks tells the right differences between the 2 photos. The player needs to finish choosing a button before the allotted time that is shown in the timer at the top of the screen. After the user selects a button, he needs to press the “NEXT” at the bottom of the screen, to continue to the next photo. If the player did not finish the level in the allotted time, he will be transferred to the next photo. To win the game the player needs to finish all the levels of the game.
